item.description:
Grafton Street Pub is one of the nicer venues in Cambridge. I have been meaning to check this place out for a while. It has a 4 star review with 29 ratings on Meetup and a 3.5 star rating with 257 reviews on Yelp. Located on Massachusetts Avenue about half a mile from the Harvard Square T-stop, it is accessible from the Red Line.

We will meet in front of the building at 9PM sharp to get a table. If you arrive late, ask for the meetup group and (hopefully) you will be shown to the group table. Seating may be limited for latecomers as this place gets very busy.

Please RSVP so I know approximately how many people to expect.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the building at 9PM sharp to get a table. This place gets pretty busy; if you are late, look for us inside.

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Saturday Night at Grafton Street Pub in Cambridge
